definition: to walk (side part of split character)
scallops along lower edge of flag
to go on a tour/to have an outing
to amuse oneself/to have fun/to go sightseeing/to take a stroll
to lobby/to campaign/to promote (an idea, a product)/(old) to visit various rulers and promote one's political ideas (in the Warring States period)

sentences.english: When you stop SPINNING, it's always good to ease into a couple strokes of regular backstroke.
sentences.chinese: 轉臂遊結束後，最好放輕鬆遊幾下正常的仰泳。

sentences.english: Pinocchio went on swimming close to shore.
sentences.chinese: 匹諾曹繼續靠着岸邊遊。

sentences.english: In May, people tour the Gold Fish Pond, offer incense at Zhongding and the Yaowang (God of Medicines) Temple.
sentences.chinese: 五月遊金魚池，中頂進香，藥王廟進香。

sentences.english: The resources of ecological tourism in China are very plentiful.
sentences.chinese: 中國生態遊資源十分豐富。

sentences.english: You simply cannot miss the chance for such a unique Chinese cultural tour!
sentences.chinese: 這麼一趟別具趣味的中國文化遊，你又怎能錯過呢？

sentences.english: They love southern France. You can get on a boat and cruise the Mediterranean.
sentences.chinese: 他們喜歡法國南部，你可以登船遊地中海。

sentences.english: Spring Festival Japan swam, absolute can let you see and have a look.
sentences.chinese: 春節日本遊，絕對可以讓你看飽眼福。

sentences.english: Nobody teaches you how to do the doggy- paddle.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人教你如何遊狗刨式。

sentences.english: Mr. White going to swim China next year.
sentences.chinese: 懷特先生打算明年遊中國。

sentences.english: The guide disguised his guilty of mixing the liquor width a liter of liquid.
sentences.chinese: 遊把酒與一公升液體混合的罪過掩飾起來。

sentences.english: The first group will consist of 600 people and currently the number of applicants has exceeded 300.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮遊首發團定員600人，目前報名人數已經過半。

sentences.english: You're connected to two blood IVs .
sentences.chinese: 你連接到兩個血液個人遊。

sentences.english: The five lakes tour, the worry everywhere, Floating and sinking through the ages, and who asked the east?
sentences.chinese: 落日五湖遊，煙波處處愁。浮沈千古事，誰與問東流？

sentences.english: It is our last day so we are heading back to Songpan.
sentences.chinese: 目的地是返回松潘，結束三日遊。

sentences.english: The boy can't swim across the river. Nor can his brother.
sentences.chinese: 這個男孩遊不到河的對岸，他弟弟也不行。

definition: to visit/to call on/to seek/to inquire/to investigate
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
poor/destitute/to use up/to exhaust/thoroughly/extremely/(coll.) persistently and pointlessly
to amuse oneself/to have fun/to go sightseeing/to take a stroll
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
to harness/to draw (a cart etc)/to drive/to pilot/to sail/to ride/your good self/prefixed word denoting respect (polite 敬辞)
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
